title: Morde Passive rework idea
body:
A replacement for Mordes current Iron man passive:

Morde  has routinely been described as Deceptively Tanky  this is an attempt to keep that true while reworking his iron man Passive to the Ridiculous Overloaded standards of today's character  design


What if Morde had  a % Damage reduction
That fluctuates based on Mordekaisers effective Range

( Warning ALL number values are simple amateurish attempts to help convey the ability) 


So Morde is atleast LVL  6 sitting in base 

With all abilities available his effective Range is 1000 units = 5% Damage Reduction

He cast W on an ally to help defend Mid inhibitor  tower. 
 his Effective range becomes 675 = 8% Damage Reduction.
  He Moves up pokes the wave with E
Effective Range is 650= 10% Damage Reduction
He cast his Ultimate  on a enemy champion 
Reducing his effective Range to melee = 25% Damage Reduction
His E comes back off cool down his damage reduction Drops  to 8%. 


Note: with dragon ghost Mordes Damage reduction  becomes zero.
Just a ROUGH idea that came to me.

What do you all think

replies.body: If they kept his current passive, but changed the shielding to damage reduction % it would probably be more healthy.
